verses.verse: The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

There was a certain <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of Zorah, <S%H6881><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Danites, <S%H1839><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Manoah; <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> was barren, <S%H6135><s%> and didn't <S%H3205><s%> bear.

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to the woman, <S%H802><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H6135><s%> "See now, you are barren, and don't <S%H3205><s%> bear; but you shall conceive, <S%H2029><s%> and bear <S%H3205><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>
Now therefore please beware <S%H8104><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> no wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink, <S%H8354><s%> and don't <S%H398><s%> eat any unclean thing: <S%H2931><s%>

for, <S%H2030><s%> behold, you shall conceive, and bear <S%H3205><s%> a son; <S%H1121><s%> and no razor <S%H4177><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> on his head; <S%H7218><s%> for the child <S%H5288><s%> shall be a Nazirite <S%H5139><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> from the womb: <S%H990><s%> and he shall begin <S%H2490><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>"

Then the woman <S%H802><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H559><s%> her husband, <S%H376><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "A man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to me, <S%H4758><s%> and his face was like the face <S%H4758><s%> of the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> awesome; <S%H3372><s%> and I didn't <S%H7592><s%> ask him where he was from, <S%H5046><s%> neither did he tell me his name: <S%H8034><s%>

but he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H2030><s%> 'Behold, you shall conceive, and bear <S%H3205><s%> a son; <S%H1121><s%> and now drink <S%H7941><s%> no wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink, <S%H8354><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> not any unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing; <S%H5288><s%> for the child shall be a Nazirite <S%H5139><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> from the womb <S%H990><s%> to the day <S%H3117><s%> of his death. <S%H4194><s%>'"

Then Manoah <S%H4495><s%> entreated <S%H6279><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Oh, <S%H994><s%> Lord, <S%H3068><s%> please let <S%H4994><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> whom you did send <S%H7971><s%> come again <S%H935><s%> to us, <S%H3384><s%> and teach us what we shall do <S%H6213><s%> to the child <S%H5288><s%> who shall be born. <S%H3205><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Manoah; <S%H4495><s%> and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came again <S%H935><s%> to the woman <S%H802><s%> as she sat <S%H3427><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%> but Manoah, <S%H4495><s%> her husband, <S%H376><s%> wasn't with her.

The woman <S%H802><s%> made haste, <S%H4116><s%> and ran, <S%H7323><s%> and told <S%H559><s%> her husband, <S%H376><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H376><s%> "Behold, the man has appeared <S%H7200><s%> to me, <S%H935><s%> who came to me that day. <S%H3117><s%>"

Manoah <S%H4495><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the man, <S%H376><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H376><s%> "Are you the man who spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the woman? <S%H802><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "I am."
Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Now let your words <S%H1697><s%> happen. <S%H935><s%> What shall the child <S%H5288><s%>'s way <S%H4941><s%> of life and mission be? <S%H4639><s%>"
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Manoah, <S%H4495><s%> "Of all that I said <S%H559><s%> to the woman <S%H802><s%> let her beware. <S%H8104><s%>

She may not eat <S%H398><s%> of anything that comes <S%H3318><s%> of the vine, <S%H1612><s%> neither let her drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong drink, <S%H8354><s%> nor eat <S%H398><s%> any unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing; <S%H6680><s%> all that I commanded her let her observe. <S%H8104><s%>"

Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Please, <S%H6113><s%> let us detain you, <S%H1423><s%> that we may make a young goat ready <S%H6213><s%> for you. <S%H6440><s%>"

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Manoah, <S%H4495><s%> "Though you detain <S%H6113><s%> me, <S%H398><s%> I won't eat of your bread; <S%H3899><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you will prepare <S%H6213><s%> a burnt offering, <S%H6213><s%> you must offer <S%H6213><s%> it to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>" For Manoah <S%H4495><s%> didn't <S%H3045><s%> know that he was the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "What is your name, <S%H8034><s%> that when your words <S%H1697><s%> happen, <S%H935><s%> we may honor you? <S%H3513><s%>"
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7592><s%> "Why do you ask about my name, <S%H8034><s%> since it is wonderful? <S%H6383><s%>"

So Manoah <S%H4495><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the young goat <S%H1423><s%> with the meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> it on the rock <S%H6697><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Then the angel did <S%H6213><s%> a wonderful <S%H6381><s%> thing as Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> looked on. <S%H7200><s%>

For it happened, <S%H3851><s%> when the flame went up <S%H5927><s%> toward the sky <S%H8064><s%> from off the altar, <S%H4196><s%> that the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%> in the flame <S%H3851><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%> and Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> looked on; <S%H7200><s%> and they fell on <S%H7200><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

But the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> didn't <S%H7200><s%> appear to Manoah <S%H4495><s%> or to his wife <S%H802><s%> any more. <S%H3254><s%> Then Manoah <S%H4495><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that he was the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his wife, <S%H802><s%> "We shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> because we have seen <S%H7200><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>"

But his wife <S%H802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3863><s%> "If Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> were pleased <S%H2654><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us, <S%H3947><s%> he wouldn't have received a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and a meal offering <S%H5930><s%> at our hand, <S%H3027><s%> neither would he have shown <S%H7200><s%> us all these things, <S%H6256><s%> nor would at this time have told <S%H8085><s%> such things as these. <S%H2063><s%>"

The woman <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and named <S%H7121><s%> him <S%H8034><s%> Samson: <S%H8123><s%> and the child <S%H5288><s%> grew, <S%H1431><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> blessed him. <S%H1288><s%>
The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to move <S%H6470><s%> him in Mahaneh <S%H4264><s%> Dan, <S%H1835><s%> between Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and Eshtaol. <S%H847><s%>
